LostItemReport.title: LostItemReport
LostItemReport.description: Represents a report of a lost item.

reporterId.description: The UID of the user who reported the lost item.

reporterName.description: The name of the person who lost the item.

itemName.description: A brief name or description of the lost item.

location.description: The location where the item was lost.

contactNumber.description: The contact number of the reporter.

remarks.description: Any additional remarks about the lost item.

imageURL.description: URL of an uploaded image of the lost item.

dateReported.description: The server timestamp when the item was reported.

status.description: The current status of the report.

FoundItemReport.title: FoundItemReport
FoundItemReport.description: Represents a report of a found item.

finderId.description: The UID of the user who found the item.

finderName.description: The name of the person who found the item.

itemName.description: A brief name or description of the found item.

location.description: The location where the item was found.

contactNumber.description: The contact number of the finder.

remarks.description: Any additional remarks about the found item.

imageURL.description: URL of an uploaded image of the found item.

dateReported.description: The server timestamp when the item was reported.

status.description: The current status of the report.

definition.description: Collection of lost item reports. Each document represents a lost item reported by a user.

params.name: reportId
params.description: The unique identifier for the lost item report.

definition.description: Collection of found item reports. Each document represents a found item reported by a user.

params.name: reportId
params.description: The unique identifier for the found item report.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to ensure authorization independence, clarity, and scalability. Each top-level collection represents a distinct entity (lost items, found items). Ownership is enforced via a user ID field in each document, allowing for secure path-based ownership rules. This structure facilitates secure listing operations by keeping similar documents within the same collection.
